data.additionalPlain:
About our team :

At its core, OpsPlatform bridges the gap between the “offline world” and “online Gojek”. Our products span the gamut of the Gojek universe - driver and fleet onboarding; in-vehicle monetization to increase driver earnings; driver care operations in city walk-in centers; customer care and KYC workflows for drivers, merchants and customers; and sales technology products to empower the food and payment sales teams. 
The overarching company theme that we’ve made our own is this - Eliminate human bottlenecks and increase productivity 10X.


Gojek is an equal opportunity workplace that is committed to diversity and inclusion. At Gojek we celebrate our differences, because we believe that diversity not only creates a healthier work environment for our employees, but also helps our business thrive. 

About us

Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

data.descriptionPlain:
Ops Platform is responsible for a suite of platforms and services that power Gojek’s driver, merchant and customer operations.

Some of the important problems you will be working on alongside our team - complex ticket arbitration workflows that auto-resolve driver and customer tickets within seconds, ML-based ticket issue prediction systems, GoAgent app for assisted driver on-boarding and product sales, KYC integrations with government agencies, facial recognition systems to combat fraud, and OCR-powered tech to bring efficiencies to driver and merchant on-boarding workflows.

lists.content:
• Design and develop highly scalable, reliable and fault tolerant systems for a suite of platforms and services.
  • Coordinate with cross functional teams (Mobile, DevOps, Data, UX, QA, etc.) on building and managing fully automated build/test/deployment environments. 
  • Communicate, collaborate and work effectively across cross functional teams in a global environment (OpsPlatform teams are in Bengaluru, Jakarta and Singapore).
  • Automate the grunge work so you are free to work on what matters most.
  • Learn new languages and methodologies to constantly hone your craft. Our product tech stack includes Ruby on Rails, GoLang, Clojure, Java, React, Android (100% Kotlin), iOS (100% Swift).

•  Should at least have 2 years of experience in Android app development
  •  Strong understanding of Android Apps architecture and implementation
  •  Prior experience in building SDKs and proficiency in Kotlin, Git and Gradle
  • Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies
  • Well versed with Agile methodologies, TDD, scrum, sprints
  • Ability to plan, prioritise, estimate and execute releases with a good degree of predictability
  • Ability to scope, review, refine user stories for technical completeness and to alleviate dependency risks

• Knowledge of Docker and Kubernetes is a plus!
  • Proficiency in any one SCM - git, mercurial etc. 
  • TDD is a bonus!
  • Be Proactive, Accountable, Fast.
  • Prior experience in working in a fast-paced, innovative environment huge plus.

About the Role
 
We are looking for Quality Automation Engineers for our Ops Platform team in Bangalore. As Quality Automation Engineer you will be part of team that builds growth tools covering experimentation, discovery, personalisation, and promotions at a scale that spans across 20 products. Because our work affects across the teams, You get an opportunity to work with engineers who are part of Transport, Food Delivery, C2C logistics and Mobile Payments space at a really interesting combinations of scale and complexity.

lists.content:
• Operate, build processes and automations on top of our cloud and platforms to empower the engineering team of one of the world’s fastest-growing unicorns
  • Manage a fully automated build/test/deploy environments
  • Maintain services and overall system health by implementing proper monitoring and symptoms based alerting policies
  • Collaborate with engineers across different teams to ensure services and components are operating reliably and securely
  • Collaborate to solve production issues across services and levels of the stack

• At least 3 years of experience in a similar role
  • Deep knowledge about systems – edge cases, failure modes, behaviors, specific implementations and you know your way around Linux and the Unix Shell
  • Strong scripting skills with the preferred language of either Bash, Ruby, Python, or Go and eager to continuously improve your programming skills
  • Experienced with Infrastructure As Code; such as Terraform and container technologies; such as CGroups, Docker, Rocket, or LXC, etc.
  • Knowledge of configuration management systems such as Puppet, Chef, Salt, or Ansible and cluster orchestrators and schedulers (Kubernetes, LXD, or Docker Swarm, etc.)
  • Experience in managing Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud Platform, Azure or similar cloud platforms
  • Experience in monitoring and alerting setup tools on production
